scripts.install:core: cd core && yarn && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.install:all: yarn install:core && yarn install:web && yarn install:mobile
scripts.update:core: cd core && yarn upgrade && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.update:web: cd web && yarn upgrade && yarn link ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.update:mobile: cd mobile && yarn upgrade && yarn link ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.update:all: yarn update:core && yarn update:web && yarn update:mobile
scripts.npm.install:core: cd core && npm install && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.npm.install:web: cd web && npm install && npm install ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.npm.install:mobile: cd mobile && npm install && npm install ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.npm.install:all: npm npm.install:core && npm npm.install:web && npm npm.install:mobile
scripts.npm.update:core: cd core && npm update && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.npm.update:web: cd web && npm update && npm install ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.npm.update:mobile: cd mobile && npm update && npm install ../core/mh-core-2.0.0.tgz
scripts.npm.update:all: npm npm.update:core && npm npm.update:web && npm npm.update:mobile
